definition: lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Pedestrians were splashed to the HIP in muddy slush.
sentences.chinese: 行人走在泥漿中，下半身全濺上了污泥。

sentences.english: No matter how steadfast the upper half is , it just can't defeat the weakness of the lower half.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身多麼堅貞，也敵不過下半身的軟弱。

sentences.english: Hui and Rong fell in love with each other. His lower body became completely paralyzed.
sentences.chinese: 輝和蓉相親相愛，但自從輝受傷後，下半身完全癱瘓。

sentences.english: In this series of lessons we'll learn how to draw the human lower body.
sentences.chinese: 在這一系列的教訓，我們將學習如何繪製人體下半身。

sentences.english: You do not want you upper body and lower body to turn together.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓上半身和下半身一起轉動。

sentences.english: This accounts for the two fractured ankles and the lacerations of my legs and lower body.
sentences.chinese: 這次碰撞又造成我兩根踝骨斷裂，腿和下半身都撞破。

sentences.english: But her lower body was still pinned down by heavy bricks.
sentences.chinese: 但是，她的下半身仍被重重的磚塊壓着。

sentences.english: This body shape is usually bigger up top and smaller on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 這種體型的人通常上半身塊頭較大而下半身比例稍小。

sentences.english: The spear went into his intestines and basically did a number on his lower half.
sentences.chinese: 長槍戳穿了他的腸子，而且基本上重創了他的下半身。

sentences.english: "Our culture tells us that all men need to be happy is sex, " Neuman says.
sentences.chinese: 我們的文化總是認爲，男人用下半身說話。

sentences.english: So on the backswing, your upper body is turning your lower body into your right side.
sentences.chinese: 在上杆的時候，上半身是帶動着下半身轉到右側的。

sentences.english: He is paralyzed from the waist down.
Add some steps to your shoulder isolations by moving your lower body.
sentences.chinese: 添加一些步驟來隔離你的肩膀上移動你的下半身。

sentences.english: Themethod for evaluating whole body dose in half-body irradiated phantom was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了下半身照射所致人體全身劑量的估算方法。

definition: the four limbs of the body
